text: The men's 800 metre swimming competition at the 2015 Summer Universiade in Gwangju was held on 4–5 July at the Nambu University International Aquatics Center. ==Schedule== All times are Korea Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | rowspan=3|Saturday, 4 July 2015 || 08:30 || Heat 1 |- | 08:39 || Heat 2 |- | 08:45 || Heat 3 |- |Sunday, 5 July 2015 || 19:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== ===Heats=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
